ACTINVRB.MX.long_name: Corporación Actinver, S. A. B. de C. V.
ACTINVRB.MX.summary: CorporaciÃ³n Actinver, S. A. B. de C. V., through its subsidiaries, provides treasury and investment banking services for businesses or civil corporations in Mexico and internationally. It operates through Investment Funds Management; Treasury and Investment Banking; Brokerage; Credit and Corporate Activities; Leasing; and Other Service Activities segments. The company offers current accounts; demand and time deposits; certificates of deposit; debit cards; cheque books; commercial, consumer, and structured loans; credits and financing services; leasing services; and investment funds, retirement plans, and corporate pension funds, as well as issues debt securities. It also provides financial advisory services for bonds or stocks underwriting; investment advisory, insurance and risk management, and insurance consulting services; financial, economic, accounting, legal, and commercial advisory services; financial intermediation services for the placement of securities or notes; intermediation services on insurance and bonding transactions; and private equity funds operation and management services. In addition, the company offers securities transactions and trust services; administrative, distribution, valuation, promotion, and acquisition services associated with investment portfolios of investment funds; property acquisition, purchase/sale, leasing, financing, brokerage, exploitation, disposal, and fractioning services; supervision, consultancy, technical, and professional services; and currency trading, securities lending, advisory and management, asset management and custody, and electronic banking services. Further, it invests in businesses, companies, and partnerships; purchases and sells securities; and acts as financial intermediary in transactions with securities and derivative financial instruments. The company was formerly known as Grupo Actinver, S.A. de C.V. CorporaciÃ³n Actinver, S. A. B. de C. V. was founded in 1994 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

GSFI11.SA.long_name: General Shopping E Outlets Do Brasil Fundo De Investimento Imobiliario FII

MIG.AT.summary: Marfin Investment Group Holdings S.A. is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing in seed/startups, middle market, mature, turnarounds, mezzanine financing, PIPEs, industry consolidation, and buyouts. It also focuses on privatizations and infrastructure projects. The firm seeks to make investments in dairy products, juices, frozen foods, drink mixes, marine, healthcare providers and services, airlines, software and services, food and beverages, Information Technology and telecommunication, transportation and shipping, tourism and leisure, real estate management and development, and real estate investment trusts (REITs). The firm prefers to invest in SEE countries with a primary focus on Albania, Bulgaria, Romania, Serbia, Greece, and Turkey. It makes balance sheet investments and also invests through its personal capital. Marfin Investment Group Holdings S.A. was founded in 1998 and is based in Athens, Greece with additional offices in London, United Kingdom and Athens, Greece.
